value.reason: Clicking 'Continue' after filling out details for account creation yields an error.

excludedCookieDomains.reason: On some Google sign-in flows, there is an error after entering username and proceeding: 'Your browser has cookies disabled. Make sure that your cookies are enabled and try again.'
After sign-in for Google Pay flows, there is repeated flickering and a loading spinner, preventing the flow from proceeding.
After sign-in for Google Pay flows (after flickering is resolved), blocking this causes the loading spinner to spin indefinitely, and the payment flow cannot proceed.

firstPartyTrackerCookiePolicy.readme: This policy is deprecated. We are expanding this protection to all first party cookies set by scripts and using firstPartyCookiePolicy policy instead.

excludedCookieDomains.reason: On some Google sign-in flows, there is an error after entering username and proceeding: 'Your browser has cookies disabled. Make sure that your cookies are enabled and try again.'
After sign-in for Google Pay flows, there is repeated flickering and a loading spinner, preventing the flow from proceeding.
After sign-in for Google Pay flows (after flickering is resolved), blocking this causes the loading spinner to spin indefinitely, and the payment flow cannot proceed.

value.reason: After performing a search, the site displays a page stating that the browser is not supported, and results are not shown.

A banner at the bottom which warns of an 'Unsupported browser' and interferes with rest of the UI.
Stream page shows an incompatibility warning and does not load further.
